backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing user profile management, inquiry submission (public), admin credential validation via username/password returning a session access key, and admin-gated inquiry operations (list, mark resolved, delete) protected by that access key.
backend/migration.mo: Trivial migration module that accepts and returns an empty record, serving as a no-op migration hook for the actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features — sessionStorage-based admin login flow and access-key-based admin query hooks — to their respective source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a human-readable index of component and hook responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Tailwind directives and defining CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, Google Fonts (Playfair Display and Inter), and mounting the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router setup with all application routes (home, products, quality, global footprint, contact, admin dashboard, admin login) wrapped in a shared Layout shell.
frontend/src/components/CertificationBad: Reusable card component that displays a certification with an icon, name, subtitle badge, description, and optional italicized note, styled with royal-blue and gold accents.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProducts: Horizontally scrollable slider showing the first four products with left/right scroll buttons (desktop only), snap scrolling, and a 'View Details' link per card.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site-wide footer with brand logo, social links (LinkedIn, Instagram), quick navigation links, and contact information including email and phone.
frontend/src/components/InquiriesTable.t: Stub component that previously rendered an inquiries table; the implementation was moved to Admin.tsx, and this file now exports a no-op component to prevent import errors.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, desktop nav links, a 'Request a Quote' CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single rice product card with an image, badge, name, description, and a specifications table showing grain length, moisture content, and purity.
frontend/src/components/RegionCard.tsx: Card component showing an export region with an icon, region name, covered countries, description, and a highlight badge.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating WhatsApp contact button in the bottom-right corner that links to a specific WhatsApp number.
Simple card component displaying an icon, title, and description for a 'Why Choose Us' feature highlight.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines the Product and ProductSpec TypeScript interfaces and exports a static array of six rice products (Basmati and Non-Basmati) with specs, badges, and image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous Internet Computer backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Custom hook managing admin authentication state via sessionStorage, providing helpers to check, save, retrieve, and clear an admin access key.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for backend interactions including submitting inquiries, validating admin credentials, fetching inquiries, and marking/deleting inquiries with session-stored access key authorization.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet using Tailwind CSS that defines AZAD NEXUS brand CSS custom properties (colors, radius) for light and dark themes, plus utility classes for typography and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays a table of customer inquiries with options to view details, mark as resolved, and delete, protected by auth state and an admin access key.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page with email/password form that calls the backend validateAdmin mutation and stores the returned access key in session storage on success.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Public contact/inquiry page with a validated form for submitting rice purchase inquiries, showing a success state after successful backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalFootprint.tsx: Displays AZAD NEXUS's export market regions (Middle East, Europe, Southeast Asia, Africa) with stats and region cards, plus a CTA section linking to contact and products pages.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with CTAs, a featured products slider, a 'Why Choose Us' section, and summary stats for the rice export business.
frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx: Product catalog page with tabbed filtering between Basmati and Non-Basmati rice varieties, rendering product cards from a shared data source.
frontend/src/pages/QualityAssurance.tsx: Quality assurance page detailing lab testing steps, packaging features, and certifications for AZAD NEXUS rice exports, with a CTA to the contact page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), OKLCH-based color tokens (royal, gold, cream, semantic UI colors), custom shadows, border radii, keyframe animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking the ICP web app's architecture, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests, primarily focused on replacing Internet Identity with a username/password admin login system backed by a Motoko canister that generates session access keys.
